Verge pk.eyJ1IjoiMmxhenkyZGVidWciLCJhIjoiY2pvbzdqdHJjMDFkOTNrc3U3cnlyZ3A0aCJ9.u6hnc-wFQhgefZW0eQRwFw //First Launch Activity Secure, anonymous and private \n Android wallet for Verge. \n Send and receive XVG //Splash screen on first launch Create a new wallet
Create a new XVG wallet on your Android device. Restore your wallet
Lost your Android wallet? Restore it here. //Fragment titles in main activity Wallet Transactions Send Receive Settings //Cards in main activity Recent transactions Price statistics History Chart //Transaction fragment Transactions Transaction No transactions received yet Open the bug XVG guide or receive XVG //Send fragment Not enough balance You do not have enough balance to send any XVG. \n Please increase your balance //Receive fragment DSiXiwK9uZ1uAy6PuqQWYBVQUaoGENZZaZ Send only XVG to this deposit address. \n Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit. //Settings fragment Manage your wallet with the options given //Splash screen texts Verge Android wallet This wallet is in alpha version for development and testing purposes. Do not deposit any funds on it. Privacy is our standard. Alpha version 0.1.5 - Development use only //Tor settings activity Tor is here for your privacy and hides your location Your IP address is fully obfuscated and transactions are completely untraceable when you\'re using a Tor connection But you can always turn Tor off. Obfuscate IP Your IP Address //Disconnect activity Disconnect this device from your current wallet You\'re about to disconnect this device from your current wallet. \n Please make absolutely sure you have written down your paper key. Remember that your paper key is the only way to restore your current wallet. Disconnect Or check your paper key once again… //paper key activity Write down your wallet paper key again You want to see your paper key again? On the next screen, you\'ll be shown a list of words to write down on a piece of paper, which you should keep very safe! Show paper key //Donate activity Donate to support development At Verge we are always striving to achieve new heights and deliver products or software implementations that are requested by the community. Listening to our community members and taking in feedback is not only one of the core founding principles of Verge, but it is inherent in our open-source nature. Donation XVG Address DHe3mTNQztY1wWokdtMprdeCKNoMxyThoV Donate XVG //Pin activity Your wallet PIN will be used to open this \n app and to send XVG with. If you forget it, \n you won\'t be able to access your wallet. Set wallet PIN //paper key introduction activity Paper key On the next screen, you\'ll be shown a list of words to write down on a piece of paper, which you should keep very safe! Your paper key is the only way to restore your Verge Wallet if your phone is lost, stolen, broken or replaced. //paper key mnemonic activity Write down paper key Write down each word in the correct order on your paper. Keep this paper in a secure location. Previous Next //paper key confirm mnemonic activity To make sure everything was written down correctly please enter the following words from your paper. Submit Your wallet is ready! \n Congratulations //Fiat Currency activity Fiat currency //Error report activity Copy error report to clipboard Exit Verge Android Wallet Verge Android Wallet Unexpected Error Show error report //Transaction detail Transaction Detail Address Transaction Id Confirmations Message //Others Price Statistics History Chart Last tweets Write down each word in the correct order on your paper High Average Low 1d 1w 1m 3m 1y All Your paper key Taking a screenshot is not secure. Write down the paper key on a piece of paper with a pen Write down each word carefully without capital letters Derive your paper key with a passphrase Encrypting your paper key is an important safety measure. Make sure when restoring a wallet to use your previous passphrase. Confirm Min. 8 characters Uppercase and lowercase Special character (!.,-#€%&+#) Enter your passphrase Confirm your passphrase QR Words Change Language Change Theme An error occurred programatically Verge Background 127.0.0.1 Open your wallet chart data only available in USD Amount to receive Share Recipient address Amount Internal memo (optional) Gift to Justin Send XVG XVG BALANCE Next Done Received Sent All Your Wallet PIN will be used to open this app, and to send XVG with. If you forget it, you won\'t be able to access your wallet. Re-enter the PIN Please insert your pin to continue Service URL Save WALLET SERVICE URL This application depends on Verge Wallet Service (VWS) for blockchain information, networking and Copayer synchronization. The default configuration points to https://vws.vergecurrency.com/vws/api (Verge\'s public VWS instance). Use default URL Enter your PIN To make sure Verge Wallet can work flawlessly, you need to allow the app to access the network and external storage to let data to be stored. Next Permissions Allow use of storage Allow use of geolocation services Allow use of camera Use Biometrics Verge Wallet lets you use your biometric data such as the fingerprint or face recognition to access your funds without having to type the PIN everytime you want to access your wallet. Verge Wallet doesn\'t store your biometric data, it just delegates the job to Android. Use fingerprint
